snippet.title: Tropical Hearts Trailer
snippet.description:
Tropical Hearts has been released in Early Access on Steam! It features 35 Events and an entire Battle Island for you to explore. Level up your magic while bonding with your friends & meeting sexy strangers in this turn based RPG!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2195690/Tropical_Hearts/

"A catchy, indie anthro dating sim that feels like a holiday! The characters are really diverse. You meet all kinds of species, all of them fun and well-developed. But there's more to this story than it seems... Highly recommend it!"

"Very excited to see its development! The characters are very sweet and the artwork is beautiful. I can recommend this game, not least because the developers have put their heart into this project, and it shows."

"For people looking for a casual RPG with a very beautiful presentation I highly recommend this one."

Want to be kept up to date? Follow us on Twitter:

https://twitter.com/Kokolorigames
